caption.p: Effects of energy and inhibitors on the NFEN endocytosis by A549 cells. (a) Cellular endocytosis situations at 4 °C and 37 °C; (b) cellular endocytosis inhibited by genistein and chlorpromazine. Results were presented as the mean ± standard deviation ( n = 3). * p ＜ .05 for the test sample compared with the other group (a) or the control (b).
